Package br.com.concepting.framework.resources

Class FactoryResourcesLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.resources.BaseResourcesLoader<XmlNode>
      • br.com.concepting.framework.resources.XmlResourcesLoader<FactoryResources>
        • br.com.concepting.framework.resources.FactoryResourcesLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LdapFactoryResourcesLoader, PersistenceFactoryResourcesLoader
    public abstract class FactoryResourcesLoader
extends XmlResourcesLoader<FactoryResources>
    Class that defines the basic implementation to manipulate factory resources.
